import React, { Component, useState } from "react"; import { InputGroup, Container, Row, Image, Button, Col, Form, } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Register.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function FormExample() { const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); const [cpassword, currentPass] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } const checkPassword = (event) => { if ({cpassword} === event.target.value) { event.target.className += "was-validated"; } } setValidated(true); }; return (
First name Looks good! Last name Looks good! Email Please provide a valid email address. Trading Experience Risk Appetite Password currentPass(event.target.value)} /> Please provide a password. Confirm password checkPassword(event)} /> Please provide a password.
); } class Register extends Component { render() { return ( ); } } export default Register;
